In Nine-Tails Chakra Mode, Minato scatters [[Flying Thunder God Kunai]] around the opponent, slashing them each time he warps.

== Trivia ==
* The final slash Minato performs is the same he used against Obito, just before Obito becomes the Ten-Tails' jinchūriki.
